patthana16.39:1.1: Micchattaniyataṃ hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca namicchattaniyato nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā terasa, ārammaṇe nava …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate terasa.
patthana16.39:2.1: Micchattaniyataṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasammattaniyato nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā nava …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate nava.
